title: Day 1: Winter Vinecki's Got Wheels
description:
Aerial skier Winter Vinecki reveals Team USA's most sought after resource inside the village: Bikes! The marathon runner and gymnastics fan finds common ground with Elizabeth Beisel about turning loss into positive action.

Follow In The Village an Amazon Music for an inside look at the athlete life in Beijing, and watch all the Olympic action unfold on the networks of NBC.
author: tess.quinlan@nbcuni.com (NBC Olympics)
